title: Introduction to Operating Systems
description: Introduction to sequential and multiprogramming operating systems; kernel calls, interrupt service mechanisms, scheduling, files and protection mechanisms, conventional machine attributes that apply to operating system implementation, virtual memory management, and I/O control systems. 3 lectures, 1 laboratory. Crosslisted as CPE/CSCÂ 453.
prerequisites: CSC/CPE 357, and CSC/CPE 225 or CPE/EE 229 or CPE/EE 233
